name: Horse Racing 3D 2015 Free
description:
Horse Racing is Amazing 3D horse racing game for everyone. You will love to Face Different Challenges during game play.

Features
-Amazing 3D Horse Racing Game for everyone.
-Different Challenges in Different Stages.
-Hurdle Racing (Available in Full Version)
-Normal Racing.
-Time Trial. (Available in Full Version)
-Training Stage
-Suitable for all age group.
-Realistic Effects in the Game.
-Ranking system in the Game.
-Use the Keyboard keys to Control the Horse (Arrow & Space Keys).
-Fully Tested on iMac,Macbook,Mac Mini & Other.

Ratings & Feedback Appreciated.

Note: Upgrade to Full Version to Unlock all the Stages. You can also unlock different horses through in-app purchase.
